frontmatter.title: Parallax Effect in UIKit - NSCoder Chicago

markdownRemark.html: This year one of my goals was to try to get into confrence speaking. That... uh... isn't exactly working out thanks to our good friend COVID-19. But I was given the opportunity to do a quick talk for a remote NSCoder Chicago meetup and I talked about an experiment I've been doing using UIInterpolatingMotionEffect to create some parallax effects in UIKit. This is a raw screen recording with only my audio.
